    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AlertUtils
    Utility class for displaying alert dialogs.
    CarrierController
    Controller for the Carrier interface.
    CartItem
    Represents an item in the shopping cart.
    CartManager
    Shopping Cart Manager for the current shopping session.
    Coupon
    Represents a discount coupon in the system.
    CouponDAO
    Data Access Object for Coupon operations.
    CustomerController
    Controller for the Customer interface.
    DatabaseAdapter
    Database Adapter class for managing MySQL database connections.
    InvoiceGenerator
    Invoice Generator for creating text-based invoices.
    LoginController
    Controller for the Login screen.
    LoyaltySettings
    Represents loyalty settings for the system.
    LoyaltySettingsDAO
    Data Access Object for LoyaltySettings operations.
    Main
    Main entry point for the Greengrocer Application.
    Message
    Represents a message between customer and owner.
    MessageDAO
    Data Access Object for Message operations.
    Order
    Represents an order in the Greengrocer system.
    OrderDAO
    Data Access Object for Order operations.
    OrderItem
    Represents an individual item within an order.
    OwnerController
    Controller for the Owner interface.
    PdfInvoiceGenerator
    PDF Invoice Generator using iTextPDF library.
    Product
    Represents a product (vegetable or fruit) in the Greengrocer system.
    ProductDAO
    Data Access Object for Product operations.
    Rating
    Represents a carrier rating from a customer.
    RatingDAO
    Data Access Object for Rating operations.
    RegistrationController
    Controller for the Registration screen.
    SceneNavigator
    Utility class for scene navigation.
    SessionManager
    Session Manager for tracking the currently logged-in user.
    ShoppingCartController
    Controller for the Shopping Cart window.
    User
    Represents a user in the Greengrocer system.
    UserDAO
    Data Access Object for User operations.
    ValidationUtils
    Utility class for input validation.
